data.name: Your Fear
data.detailed_description:
ATTENTION: PROJECT IS ON HOLD DUE TO LACK OF RESPONSE. IF ANYONE WORKS AT ROVIO PLEASE REACH OUT TO ME: yourfeargame@gmail.com


Dear Reader,

I welcome you happily to Your Fear's official Steam page!

What is this game is about?


Your Fear invites the player deep into a haunting story of hidden mystery and bitter despair.
The game consists of 19 levels, each level is uniquely designed with its own puzzles and hazards to overcome and to test the nerves of even the most jaded player.
One wrong move taken in haste is all takes for you too to get torn to pieces!

Why should I play this?


This game offers you..

  • ..a powerful story.
  • ..exciting puzzles.
  • ..last but not least a great atmosphere provided by:
    • Great but still playable on many machines graphics.
    • Great soundtrack and cool sound effects!
    • Challenging bossfights!


...are you ready to face Your Fear? :)

Thank you for reading my description of this game and I wish you to have a great experience!

Greg

data.short_description: You must find your daughter and wife in a hospital where everyone turns into a light sensitive monster caused by an odd epidemic.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+, 8, 10, 64-bit versions only
  • Processor: AMD FX-8320 Eight-Core
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Have one.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.12+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 M370X
  • Storage: 10000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Have one.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04, 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: AMD FX-8320 Eight-Core
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560
  • Storage: 10000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Have one.

content_descriptors.notes: Sometimes the player can see violent death.
